text: 2 firm white fish fillets (about 5 oz / 150g each), skin off, at room temperature
label: ingredient

text: Combine the Crumb ingredients and mix well to combine.
label: step

text: Sprinkle both sides of fish with salt and pepper, then spread the mustard on the top of each fillet (top only).
label: step

text: Press the mustard smeared side of the fish into the crumb mixture. Press down firmly to make it stick. Then spray with oil (for extra golden crumb!).
label: step

text: Drizzle 1/2 tbsp oil in a skillet and preheat on the stove over high heat.
label: step

text: Once skillet is hot, place the fillets in the hot pan then place under the grill / broiler (about 5"/15cm from the heat source) for 5 - 6 minutes until the crumb is golden and the fish is cooked, rotating as required. Fish should flake in centre once cooked.
label: step

text: Oven option: bake at 220C/390F for 10 - 12 minutes, then finish under the grill/broiler on high to make the crumb golden.
label: step
